title: The USB Lie Detector.
description: Finally we'll get the TRUTH out of Austin Evans.   Test your self!   I built a Laptop:  Why the PS5 is LOSING Money:  Fast Food Tier List:  I sold my body on Amazon.com:   Reddit is Killing GameStop    Check out Austin on Twitch:  Vibe with Matt on Twitch:  Chill with Ken on Twitch:    By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:
